title: A Few T205s Available for Sale - REDUCED - ALL ARE SOLD
author: Eggoman

posts.post_title: A Few T205s Available for Sale - REDUCED - ALL ARE SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hello All!

I just upgraded a few cards for my T205 set and am making these available for a few days before the go off to eBay.  (ALL cards have some LIGHT creasing which is a little difficult to see in the scans.)

[strike]Hal Chase - New York Yankees – Diamond Frame Extends Below Shoulders variety – $42.00[/STRIKE] - SOLD

[STRIKE]MINOR LEAGUER Charles Hanford – Jersey City Skeeters - [/STRIKE][STRIKE]$50.00[/STRIKE] - SOLD

[STRIKE]Danny Hoffman – St. Louis Browns – YELLOW SECOND BASE variety - $20.00[/STRIKE] SOLD!

[strike]Barney Pelty – St. Louis Browns - [STRIKE]$25.00[/STRIKE] - SOLD[/strike]


In my opinion, ALL cards measure correctly for the issue and have not been trimmed or “doctored” in any way!

Please message me if you are interested.  I will sell these cards in the order that I receive your requests. "A commitment to buy takes precedence over ongoing negotiations.”  (I stole that phraseology from someone, but I DO like it!)

PLEASE add $2.00 for shipping.

PayPal – Friends or Family OR “Regular” PayPal + 3%!

Thank you for your consideration!
